nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene

Class SpansAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.spans.Spans
      • nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene.SpansAbstract
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BLSpans

    public abstract class SpansAbstract
extends org.apache.lucene.search.spans.Spans
    SpansAbstract is our abstract base class for implementing our own Spans classes. It implements a naive default implementation for skipTo. Derived classes may choose to provide their own, more efficient version. It also provides default implementations for getPayload() and isPayloadAvailable().
